content.prompt: The excerpt makes the overall argument that the Atlantic economy

choices.label: drove long-lasting economic shifts across Europe, Africa, and the Americas
contributed to the persistence of feudal economic systems
contributed to the collapse of European empires

topic.text: 1.4: Columbian Exchange, Spanish Exploration, and Conquest

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
